entry.title: Arbaz3008/TextRepeater: A Simple Text Repeater is a lightweight tool that takes user input and repeats it multiple times based on a specified count. It can be useful for generating repeated phrases, testing UI elements, or just for fun. Key Features: Customizable Repeats – Users can set how many times the text should be repeated. Line Breaks or Single Line
entry.content: A Simple Text Repeater is a lightweight tool that takes user input and repeats it multiple times based on a specified count. It can be useful for generating repeated phrases, testing UI elements, or just for fun. Key Features: Customizable Repeats – Users can set how many times the text should be repeated. Line Breaks or Single Line

entry.title: GihanIT/HTML-QR-Code-Generator-for-WIFI-URLs: A simple, lightweight web application that generates QR codes for URLs and Wi-Fi credentials. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript using the qrcode.js library, this app allows users to create QR codes and download them as PNG images.
entry.content: A simple, lightweight web application that generates QR codes for URLs and Wi-Fi credentials. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript using the qrcode.js library, this app allows users to create QR codes and download them as PNG images.

entry.title: IntegerSachin7/react-mini-project-weather-app-: 🌤️ Mini Weather App A simple weather app that fetches real-time data using an API. Search any city to get temperature, conditions, and more. Built with React, it features a clean UI and responsive design. Uses OpenWeather API for accurate forecasts. Fast, lightweight, and easy to use! 🚀 Let me know if you need any changes! 😊

entry.title: Namangupta123/Gramify: Gramify is a lightweight and powerful browser extension designed to seamlessly fix grammar mistakes in any text area on any website. Whether you’re drafting an email, writing a blog post, or engaging on social media, Gramify works quietly in the background to ensure your writing is polished and professional.
entry.content: Gramify is a lightweight and powerful browser extension designed to seamlessly fix grammar mistakes in any text area on any website. Whether you’re drafting an email, writing a blog post, or engaging on social media, Gramify works quietly in the background to ensure your writing is polished and professional.
